document.discussion_title: Police investigating fatal motorcycle crash in Southeast Austin
document.topic_text: Police investigating fatal motorcycle crash in Southeast Austin American-Statesman Sunday 24th April, 2016 A motorcyclist, thought to be a man in his 30s, was killed after being involved in a crash in Southeast Austin, authorities said.Austin police and Austin-Travis County EMS responded to an incident in the 1600 block of Royal Crest Drive, between East Riverside Drive and Woodland Avenue shortly after 6:13 p.m., senior police officer Christopher Irwin said Saturday evening.The motorcyclist, who was wearing a helmet, was found in a ditch and first responders tried to save the man, Irwin said, but they were unsuccessful. The man was pronounced dead on the scene, he said....

The man was pronounced dead on the scene, he said....
